did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files
RG-2/1/2.901

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-2/1/2.901, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library on 1990 August 14.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by the president of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.
The papers consist of: general files, 1987-1988; seldom used permanent files, 1984-1987; administrative committee files, 1987-1988; and, files on background materials for speeches, 1985-1987.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: General Files, 1987-1988 Boxes 1-46
Series II: Seldom Used Permanent Files, 1984-1987 Boxes 46-51
Series III: Administrative Committee Files, 1987-1988 Boxes 51-52
Series IV: Background Materials for Speeches, 1985-1987 Boxes 53-55
Series V: Restricted Materials Boxes 56-57
